DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety vildagliptin 50 mg bid add-on therapy metformin plus glimepiride patient Type 2 Diabetes ( T2D ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Galvus add-on Therapy Metformin Plus Glimepiride
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Confirmed diagnosis T2DM standard criterion . Treatment oral antidiabetic therapy , stable dose least 12 week prior screen visit . Acceptable background antidiabetic therapy include : metformin ( ≥ 1500 mg ) monotherapy combination SU , TZDs , glinides Age : ≥18 ≤ 80 year HbA1c ≥ 7.5 ≤ 11.0 % Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥22 ≤45 kg/m2 Exclusion criterion : FPG ≥ 270 mg/dL ( ≥ 15.0 mmol/L ) Acute metabolic diabetes complication ketoacidosis hyperosmolar state ( coma ) within past 6 month Any follow within past 6 month : Myocardial infarction , TIA stroke , coronary artery bypass surgery percutaneous coronary intervention History hypersensitivity study drug drug similar chemical class Acute infection may affect blood glucose control within 4 week prior screen Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
